mapper.insert: insert into advertisement (title, content, productName, imgUrl, productUrl, userNum) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{productName}, #{imgUrl}, #{productUrl},#{userNum})
mapper.select: select * from advertisement where userNum=#{userNum} ORDER BY adsNum desc
mapper.update: update advertisement set status=#{status}, updatedAt = NOW() where adsNum=#{adsNum}
